meanings.definition: Relating to the study of diseases caused by the immune system.
meanings.sent1: The immunopathologic research focused on understanding how the immune system affects diseases.
meanings.sent2: Doctors conducted an immunopathologic study to learn more about immune system-related illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The immunopathologic investigation into allergies revealed some surprising findings.
meanings.sent4: Her immunopathologic approach to treating autoimmune diseases was innovative and effective.
meanings.sent5: The immunopathologic nature of the condition made it challenging to diagnose accurately.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the abnormal functioning of the immune system.
meanings.sent1: The patient's symptoms pointed to an immunopathologic reaction within their body.
meanings.sent2: The immunopathologic response led to complications in the patient's recovery.
meanings.sent3: Despite its seriousness, the immunopathologic condition had a quirky side effect.
meanings.sent4: The immunopathologic behavior of the immune system was like a puzzle for the doctors to solve.
meanings.sent5: The immunopathologic changes in the body were evident through various tests.
